abstract: For social media influencers and oversharers, life is full of material. But what if their friends donâ€™t want to be the co-stars?
lead_paragraph: Despite what #wanderlust boards on Pinterest may want you to believe, it does not feel glamorous to arrive in a foreign country, in the dead of night, bedraggled from a long flight and in need of a cab. Ellen Wright, 29, found herself in such a situation last summer while traveling with a group of friends.
